about_the_game:
Luck & Loot is a dice-builder roguelike all about crafting unique dice and unleashing their power upon corrupted enemies. Customize your dice, collect game changing loot, and explore procedurally generated realms of Eldralith as you try to end the cycle once and for all!

Nostalgic Roguelike With A Dice Building Twist

Play as different heroes with uniquely personal builds and uniquely personal stakes. Swap out dice faces as you build the perfect quartet, all while growing each hero’s power and awakening to the eldritch enigma of eternity. 

Embark on arcade style adventures with growing character unlocks on your path to finally defeat a once beloved lich in his corrupted kingdom.

Dynamic Dice Building

Craft your perfect build with interchangeable and upgradeable dice faces. Swap and customize your dice while exploring, sacrificing unused sides to unlock powerful traits. Choose wisely, as each dice can only hold so much power, and every decision brings you closer to ultimate mastery—or peril.

Pixel Peril & Chiptune Charm

Fall into the nostalgia of Luck & Loot’s 1-bit, dark fantasy world. Invite the mystical, chiptune-style soundtrack to be your boon companion through each journey.

Will you shatter the cycle—or become another soul lost to endless despair? Roll the dice and face your fate in Luck & Loot.

Features:

  • 3 Heroes with their own unique sets of dice faces

  • 4 Ever customizable dice

  • 5 Unique dungeons, each dominated by a formidable foe

  • 12+ Powerful dice upgrades

  • 15+ Difficulty modifiers

  • 30+ Random events

  • 35+ Unique relics

  • 40+ Creature types and Bosses

  • 100+ Interchangeable and upgradeable dice faces

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Luck & Loot is under development and the minimum requirements might change before a full release.
